name: Ramsey's Garden
description:
You might get confused playing for second or third time. I recently realized I had not called score reset function after a game was complete, so you need to restart the game for accurate result and for not getting confused.

Farming simulation: grow fruits in climber plant, collect them, dont let any plant climb to the roof.

Collect 25 fruits as fast as you can. Water the plant to grow fruit faster for 10 seconds, but it also makes plant grow faster, so cut the plant before it reaches roof.  

Controls:
arrow keys to move
Z to shuffle items
X to use item

Score system:

                                                       fruit X 500

Water plants frequently. But it does not count if the plant is already growing faster.
                                                      water X 100

Use scissor wisely as it reduces the score.
                                                      cut X -200

Time remaining boost your score so collect those fruits as fast as you can. Time does not count if you could not collect 25 fruits
                                                      time X 250

Music : HappyNES by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com

Cut:  Owlstorm: https://freesound.org/people/OwlStorm/sounds/404763/

Water: wyronroberth:  https://freesound.org/people/wyronroberth/sounds/516257/
